title: Boris Johnson news live: Latest Brexit updates as Dominic Cummings revels in Commons chaos
text:
Boris Johnson’s right-hand man Dominic Cummings continued No 10’s people versus parliament rhetoric by saying the anger of Leave voters was “not surprising”.

Ahead of the Tory party conference in Manchester this weekend, the prime minister said it was “fair enough” to use the term “surrender bill” for the no deal-blocking Benn bill, despite repeated warnings he was raising the risks faced by MPs.

It comes as the Church of England issued an unprecedented plea for calm, criticising MPs’ recent language as “not worthy of our country”.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.
